title: No Walking All Mid
body:
A fun new player made game mode.

Map: ARAM
Players: Anywhere from 1v1 to 5v5
How it works:

* Players are to pick champions with move champion abilities e.g. Ezreal Arcane Shift, Vayne Tumble.
* All players are to start by moving into the mid section of the ARAM map (if you were to divide the area in-between the two middle turrets into four sections, the two middle sections would be the mid section).
* Once players enter the mid section they are to cease all movement.
* The match will officially start at 2 minutes.
* Players are to only move through their abilities (flash is allowed) and can use any abilities they want to target the enemy. Auto attacks are allowed if you're in range.
* I imagine the match will end quickly so have several rounds start the match on the minute mark. 
* Have fun.

I have no idea whether this would actually be fun. Good luck.
